text: I'm gonna make some roasted carrots that
I think are one of the most fantastic

half pounds of carrots
these are nice slender carrots which I
like for this recipe because then you

because I think it adds a little bit of
like extra carrot flavor have your oven
at 450 degrees and drizzle your carrots

oil season with salt and pepper and then
just give them a toss very simple

pretty much any vegetable to be honest
not beets well you can slice beets and
do it but they come out kind of leathery
and chewy which I love eggplant needs to

take 20 to 25 minutes
